text:
@realDonaldTrump @WhiteHouse In Red states & Blue states
Trump Lets thousands die of COVID-19 

TRUMP IGNORES THE SCIENCE & FAILED TO FEDERALIZE 
A NATIONWIDE "PLAN"

THE GOP, Crickets!

NO NATIONWIDE TESTING
NO NATIONWIDE PPE

EVERY CHILD,
EVERY WORKER, 
EVERY PERSON
needs FEDERAL testing!
to reopen safely!
